# Eagle's Splendor, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[4th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 4]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (feathers or droppings from an eagle)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 275

This spell functions like *[[Eagle's Splendor (Spell)|eagleâ€™s splendor]]*, except that it affects multiple creatures.
